oracleReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT 
SEQ_NO,
PK,
replace(replace(replace(replace(HEADLINE,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'','''') as HEADLINE,
replace(replace(replace(replace(CONTENTS,char(10), ''//LF//''), char(13),''//LF//''), ''\"'', ''＂''), ''\0'','''') as CONTENTS,
P_CODE,
P_RATING,
ORDERNUMBER,
CRTDT,
MODDT
FROM ',
pipeline().parameters.SourceTable)

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT CMONTH2 AS CMONTH    
  FROM CD_ODS.APS_SDC_PW_MST
WHERE CMONTH2 BETWEEN '202101' AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE,-1),'YYYYMM')
GROUP BY CMONTH2
ORDER BY CMONTH2
